statements: SELECT * FROM PurchaseOrders WHERE order_status = 'Pending';
SELECT supplier_name, order_date FROM PurchaseOrders WHERE order_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT order_id, supplier_name, order_date, order_status FROM PurchaseOrders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM PurchaseOrders WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'W%';
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM PurchaseOrders GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING order_count > 2;
SELECT * FROM PurchaseOrders WHERE order_status = 'Pending';
SELECT supplier_name, order_date FROM PurchaseOrders WHERE order_status = 'Delivered' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, supplier_name FROM PurchaseOrders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM PurchaseOrders WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%Company%' ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM PurchaseOrders GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING total_orders > 1 ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_id DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM PurchaseOrders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' AND order_status = 'Pending';
SELECT supplier_name, order_status FROM Suppliers JOIN PurchaseOrders ON Suppliers.supplier_id = PurchaseOrders.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, order_id, order_status FROM Suppliers JOIN PurchaseOrders ON Suppliers.supplier_id = PurchaseOrders.supplier_id;
SELECT supplier_name, order_date FROM Suppliers JOIN PurchaseOrders ON Suppliers.supplier_id = PurchaseOrders.supplier_id ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email, order_status FROM Suppliers JOIN PurchaseOrders ON Suppliers.supplier_id = PurchaseOrders.supplier_id WHERE order_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM supplier;
SELECT supplier_name FROM supplier ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM purchase_order WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, order_date, status FROM supplier JOIN purchase_order ON supplier.supplier_id = purchase_order.supplier_id JOIN order_status ON purchase_order.order_id = order_status.order_id;
SELECT DISTINCT supplier_id, status_id FROM purchase_order JOIN order_status ON purchase_order.order_id = order_status.order_id;
SELECT * FROM supplier ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name FROM supplier WHERE supplier_id < 10;
SELECT * FROM purchase_order WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date ASC;

SELECT supplier.supplier_name, purchase_order.order_date, order_status.status FROM supplier INNER JOIN purchase_order ON supplier.supplier_id = purchase_order.supplier_id INNER JOIN order_status ON purchase_order.order_id = order_status.order_id;
SELECT supplier.supplier_name, purchase_order.order_date FROM supplier LEFT JOIN purchase_order ON supplier.supplier_id = purchase_order.supplier_id WHERE purchase_order.supplier_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchase_orders WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT order_id, status, location FROM order_tracking WHERE status = 'processing';
SELECT * FROM suppliers
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT order_id, status, quantity FROM purchase_orders WHERE status = 'Pending'
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, price FROM suppliers JOIN products ON suppliers.supplier_id = products.supplier_id
SELECT * FROM orders
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM suppliers
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT * FROM order_items WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%A%' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 50 ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT orders.order_id, orders.order_date, suppliers.supplier_name FROM orders INNER JOIN suppliers ON orders.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id;

SELECT orders.order_id, SUM(order_items.quantity) AS total_quantity, SUM(order_items.total_price) AS total_price FROM orders INNER JOIN order_items ON orders.order_id = order_items.order_id GROUP BY orders.order_id;
